bibl.title: Cleopatra. A Sourcebook.
bibl.note: Preface. - Introduction. - Part One: Ancient Sources. - Part Two: Reception. - Maps. - Genealogical Tables. - Chronological Table: The Death of Alexander the Great to the Death of Cleopatra. - Glossary. Selective Cleopatra Filmography. Bibliography. Index.
bibl.seg: JONES Prudence J., Cleopatra. A Sourcebook. (Oklahoma Series in Classical Culture. 31.)
Norman, OK, University of Oklahoma Press, 2006, 8°, xv-345 pp., 2 arbres généal., 7 figg., 2 cartes. ISBN 0-8061-3741-X. $19.95.

Preface. - Introduction. - Part One: Ancient Sources. - Part Two: Reception. - Maps. - Genealogical Tables. - Chronological Table: The Death of Alexander the Great to the Death of Cleopatra. - Glossary. Selective Cleopatra Filmography. Bibliography. Index.

C.R. par Susan Sorek, BMCRev < http://ccat.sas.upenn.edu/bmcr/2006/2006-11-39.html >. - Foy Scalf, JNES 69 (2010) pp. 108-109 [concerne aussi: Michel CHAUVEAU, Cleopatra: Beyond the Myth (Ithaca, New York, 2002)].
